function.name: daily_chart_eod
function.description: Fetches daily stock data for a specified company, including opening, high, low, and closing prices.

symbol.description: The stock ticker symbol for the company (e.g., AAPL)

from.description: Start date for historical data in YYYY-MM-DD format

to.description: End date for historical data in YYYY-MM-DD format

serietype.description: The type of series to return, e.g., 'line'
